[DQC.US.0086.9368] The element us-gaap:DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent with a value of 1,000,400,000 has been used in the filing. This element is a transition element and is intended to be used in periods before adoption of amendments from Accounting Standards Update 2015-17. The element should no longer be used for filings with fiscal years beginning after December 15th 2016.
